text: Hi Guys , would be nice to name brand colours? seems so trivial and would help organise multiple companies under the one portal. Similar issue here demonstrates how canva and most design platforms do it <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/HubSpot-Ideas/Brand-kits-colors-fonts-for-multiple-brands/idi-p/448360>

Reminder: Friendly reminder - <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/Ideas/ct-p/ideas|submit your ideas to the idea forum> and post the link here with your idea. The votes for a feature help HubSpotters understand the demand. Thank you for all of your awesome ideas and feedback, we are listening and appreciate it.
